casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 20, 2011

[Cite as 04/20/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-1829.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2010-2141. [State ex rel.] Wolfe v. Ross Corr. Inst.

In Mandamus. On motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss granted. Relator must obtain the sentencing entry which he seeks from the Montgomery County Clerk of Courts, not from the respondents in this case. Cause dismissed.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
